document_data.name: West Wind Stables
document_data.mainbody: '''West Wind Stables''' were stables in [[Freedale]] in [[the Dalelands]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The stables were along the way to the [[Tower of the High Wizard Netheril]], next to the [[Temple of Lathander (Freedale)|Temple of Lathander]].
document_data.Structure: There was an exercise field in the back.
document_data.Interior: The building had an office and living quarters attached. It had a hayloft.
document_data.Services: The owner, [[Joben]], and his son [[Markus (Freedale)|Markus]] looked after horses, and sometimes traded horses, too. They allowed some [[adventurer]]s to sleep on the hayloft.
